tech_news.title: Activision confirms Black Ops 7 uses gen-AI tools for assets, says they help "empower" its teams to "create the best gaming experiences possible" - PCGamesN
tech_news.description: Black Ops 7 continues Call of Duty's trend of using generative AI to help create in-game assets, according to its Steam page disclosure.

tech_news.title: Apple’s last-gen AirPods Pro 2 are down to their lowest price to date - The Verge
tech_news.description: We’re already seeing some great early Black Friday discounts, and right now Walmart is offering the AirPods Pro 2 for $139.99 ($110 off).

tech_news.title: Two tantalizing hours with Metroid Prime 4: Beyond - Game File | Stephen Totilo
tech_news.description: Wait a minute. What did that one scan mention?

tech_news.title: Sony’s Concord Is Playable Again Thanks To Fan-Made Custom Servers - The Game Post
tech_news.description: Concord is not completely dead. Community developers have brought Sony's shut-down hero shooter back online with fan-made custom servers, rebuilding its backend API and getting full matches running again.

tech_news.title: Top 100 Nintendo Games, As Chosen By Nintendo Life & IGN - Nintendo Life
9 Clever Uses For Your Old PS4 (Other Than Gaming) - bgr.com
tech_news.description: From media centers and Spotify music stations to back-up hard drives and Linux machines, there is life in your old Playstation 4, yet.

tech_news.title: Google Call Recording launches on more Pixel phones - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google has started a wider rollout of its Call Recording feature on older Pixel phones after announcing an expansion a few months ago.

tech_news.title: Apple launches new 'iPhone Pocket' carrying case to mixed reviews: '$230 for a cut up sock' - Yahoo
tech_news.description: Developed with Japanese fashion designer Issey Miyake, the tech company says it was inspired by the concept of "a piece of cloth."

tech_news.title: Rockstar's beloved cowboy epic Red Dead Redemption coming to current gen consoles and mobile next month in free update - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Red Read Redemption will next month receive a free update for current gen consoles, as well as a release across mobile devices and Netflix.
